examples: a nice steak with a bottle of red wine
synonyms: in the company of "Sharon is the one with Ike"

examples: marine mammals generally swim with the current
the form of the light curve changes with period in a systematic way

definitions.definition: possessing (something) as a feature or accompaniment.
examples: a flower-sprigged blouse with a white collar
a tall dark man with a scar on one cheek

definitions.definition: indicating the instrument used to perform an action.
indicating the material used for some purpose.

examples: we started fighting with each other

definitions.definition: indicating the manner or attitude of the person doing something.

examples: my father will be angry with me

definitions.definition: as a member or employee of.
examples: he plays with the Cincinnati Cyclones

definitions.definition: affected by (a particular fact or condition).
indicating the cause of an action or condition.
indicating separation or removal from something.
examples: to part with one's dearest possessions
